meanings.definition: A substance or organism that causes the leaves of a plant to fall off.
meanings.sent1: The defoliator sprayed on the tree made all the leaves drop off.
meanings.sent2: The defoliator caterpillar stripped the tree of its leaves.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous defoliator squirrel played a prank by making the tree lose its leaves overnight.
meanings.sent4: The defoliator worked like magic, turning the lush tree into a bare skeleton.
meanings.sent5: The defoliator's effect was swift and ruthless, leaving the tree naked and exposed.

meanings.definition: A machine or tool used to remove leaves from plants.
meanings.sent1: The gardener used a defoliator to clear the fallen leaves from the garden.
meanings.sent2: The defoliator efficiently cleaned up the leaves from the lawn.
meanings.sent3: The robotic defoliator hummed as it tidied up the garden, much to the amusement of the onlookers.
meanings.sent4: The defoliator was a leaf-eating monster, devouring every leaf in its path.
meanings.sent5: The powerful defoliator made leaf removal a breeze, saving time and effort for the gardener.
